Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Service Delayed Clinton
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing Clinton due to a door problem on a train. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing Clinton due to a door problem on a train.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
